overview: ALL we have that video work that was a delight of bad and that marked a time in our lives ... In my case, and in the galley Deslegendário, this work was BIGODES INGLÓRIOS! A supposed work that should tell an excerpt from the story of Don Quixote and that ended up giving everything wrong ... but this "all wrong" has led to the creation of a strange universe of films, shorts and videos called "Chronology Deslegendária"!
title: Bigodes Inglórios
